mapper.insert: insert into mall_msg_template(uuid,`name`,parentTypeCode,parentTypeDesc,msgTypeCode,msgTypeDesc,msgTemplate,createTime,updateTime) select #{uuid},#{name},#{parentTypeCode},#{parentTypeDesc}, #{msgTypeCode},#{msgTypeDesc},#{msgTemplate},#{createTime},#{updateTime} from DUAL where not exists (SELECT 1 FROM mall_msg_template WHERE msgTypeCode = #{msgTypeCode})
